feed.subtitle: A place to share my technical learnings.

entry.title: A Baseline Understanding of MLOps
entry.summary: Next week I’m due to begin a job as a Machine Learning Engineer at a company that works in the MLOps field. It’s a new field to me. I’ve read a good deal on it in recent weeks, and listened to a few dozen episodes of the MLOps.community podcast, but I still very much consider myself a beginner in the space. To that end, I thought it worth clarifying my understanding of what MLOps is all about, the problem it is trying to solve, and where I see the opportunity there.
